duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate plastic blow molding machines and make necessary adjustments to ensure safe, efficient, and high-quality production of containers.
Enforce safety, health, quality GMP, and company policies and procedures.
Participate in continuous quality improvement projects and related activities.
Perform mold, insert, and color changes on the line.
Conduct basic processing of injection and/or blow molding machines to improve machine efficiency and reduce scrap.
Assist in mold, insert, and color changes on the line.
Monitor resin, dryer, material handling, and color systems for appropriate processing conditions.
Perform quality checks on products and assist in mechanical repairs.
Perform assigned preventative maintenance work and maintain work area to safety and housekeeping standards.
Communicate with the Production Shift Supervisor and coordinate production line support staff.
Verify material usage, perform minor troubleshooting and programming on the line, and operate equipment to minimize waste generation.
Properly identify and communicate processing information to designated personnel on incoming shift.
Assist in the training of new Operators.
Manage operation of boxing stations, palletizers, strappers, pallet transport, stretch wrapper, and/or unscrambler.
Visually check product for defects, operate forklift, and arrange materials throughout the plant to ensure efficient workflow and proper storage of finished goods.

education_certification.credential: A minimum of 2 years in manufacturing required.
